statements: SELECT * FROM kitchen_design;
SELECT layout_drawing_name, appliance_name, customer_name FROM kitchen_design;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, review_rating FROM kitchen_design ORDER BY review_rating DESC;
SELECT layout_drawing_id, appliance_name FROM kitchen_design WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT appliance_name, review_rating FROM kitchen_design WHERE review_rating > 3 ORDER BY review_rating ASC;
SELECT * FROM kitchen_design WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT layout_drawing_id, layout_drawing_name, appliance_name FROM kitchen_design WHERE appliance_id = 456 ORDER BY layout_drawing_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, review_rating FROM kitchen_design WHERE review_rating > 3 AND customer_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT layout_drawing_name, customer_name, customer_id FROM kitchen_design WHERE customer_id = 456 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT appliance_name FROM kitchen_design WHERE layout_drawing_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY appliance_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM kitchen_layout
SELECT customer_name, date_created FROM kitchen_layout WHERE layout_id = 1
SELECT appliance_name, brand, price FROM appliance_specifications WHERE energy_rating = 'A'
SELECT * FROM kitchen_layout ORDER BY date_created DESC
SELECT appliance_name, price, brand FROM appliance_specifications WHERE price < 500
SELECT * FROM kitchen_layout WHERE customer_name='John Smith' ORDER BY date_created DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT layout_id, customer_name, date_created FROM kitchen_layout JOIN appliance_specifications ON appliance_specifications.appliance_name = 'Refrigerator' WHERE layout_id > 10 ORDER BY layout_id ASC LIMIT 10;

SELECT customer_name, design_drawings FROM kitchen_layout WHERE date_created BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND layout_id IN (SELECT layout_id FROM appliance_specifications WHERE price > 1000) ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT appliance_name, brand, price FROM appliance_specifications WHERE energy_rating='A' ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT layout_id, customer_name, date_created FROM kitchen_layout JOIN appliance_specifications ON kitchen_layout.layout_id = appliance_specifications.appliance_id WHERE kitchen_layout.layout_id < 20 ORDER BY kitchen_layout.date_created ASC;
SELECT * FROM kitchen_layout_drawings;
SELECT drawing_name, drawing_url FROM kitchen_layout_drawings WHERE designer_id = 1;
SELECT appliance_name, brand, model FROM appliance_specifications;
SELECT review_title, review_text, rating FROM customer_reviews WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT id, drawing_name, drawing_url FROM kitchen_layout_drawings;
SELECT * FROM appliance_specifications WHERE brand = 'ABC' ORDER BY appliance_name ASC;
SELECT review_title, RATING, review_text FROM customer_reviews WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM kitchen_layout_drawings kd INNER JOIN appliance_specifications ap ON kd.designer_id = ap.id;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(rating) AS total_rating FROM customer_reviews GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM kitchen_layout_drawings;
SELECT name, drawing_url FROM kitchen_layout_drawings WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name, created_at FROM kitchen_layout_drawings ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT appliance_name, type, price FROM appliance_specifications WHERE brand = 'Samsung';
SELECT customer_id, rating, review FROM customer_reviews WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM kitchen_layout_drawings WHERE designer_id = 1;
SELECT name, drawing_url FROM kitchen_layout_drawings ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT appliance_name, brand, price FROM appliance_specifications WHERE price > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT id, name, address FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT * FROM kitchen_layout;
SELECT room_name, layout_image FROM kitchen_layout WHERE id = 1;
SELECT appliance_type, brand_name, model_number, price FROM appliance_specifications WHERE price < 1000;
SELECT review_id, customer_name, rating FROM customer_reviews ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT customer_name, review_text FROM customer_reviews WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM kitchen_layout WHERE id = 1;
SELECT room_name, layout_image FROM kitchen_layout WHERE room_name LIKE 'kitchen%';
SELECT * FROM appliance_specifications ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT appliance_type, brand_name, model_number FROM appliance_specifications WHERE price < 1000;
SELECT customer_name, rating, review_text FROM customer_reviews WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY rating DESC;
